catalog_info.title: Mechanisms of Microbial Pathogenesis
catalog_info.notes: Please note that there will be an additional fee for microscope rental. Offered jointly with the Medical School as HT 040.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: A background course in molecular biology is strongly encouraged.
catalog_info.description: The mechanisms of bacterial, mycoplasmal, fungal, and viral pathogenesis are covered. Topics are selected for intrinsic interest and cover the spectrum of pathophysiologic mechanisms of the infectious process. Emphasis on pathogenesis at the molecular level.
